scripts.test: npm run test:local && npm run test:prod && npm run test:ltc
scripts.test:prod: gourmet build --verbosity 1 --stage prod --ignore-compile-errors && tape test/*_test.js --stage prod
scripts.test:ltc: gourmet build --verbosity 1 --stage ltc --ignore-compile-errors && tape test/*_test.js --stage ltc
